name: Free Halloween Game 2021
description:
Happy Halloween!

Once a week every week through the month of October I will update this game. The challenge is to see how much I can improve it in time for Halloween. I decided to take this approach as I feel its important to see the iterative process in action.

Right now its somewhere between Amateur and Hot Garbage with that generic Unity "look".  Thinking of possibly of turning this game into a collection of Halloween themed mini-games. Let's see where the next month takes us.

Note: Control is WASD and LMB.
